alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 2:10PM CDT until August 24 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties. For the Trinity River...including Dallas, Rosser, Trinidad, Long Lake (Oakwood)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River At Dallas. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Moderate flooding will begin along the river both above and below the Commerce Street bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 36.8 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 13.9 feet early Sunday afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 815 AM CDT.
